DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective : To determine level malondialdehyde ( MDA ) immunohistochemistry surrogate inflammation patient NSAID-induced gastric mucosal injury treat Rebamipide 3x day vs Esomeprazole 40mg day . Secondary objective : For patient become symptomatic NSAID treatment , compare proportion patient positive treatment effect use Likert scale . Third objective : To compare proportion patient positive treatment effect determine Modified Lanza score two group .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Double-Blind Clinical Trial Rebamipide v Esomeprazole Treatment NSAID-induced Gastropathy
